title: cintai teLindu
sahitya:
cintai teLindu yAn uyvEnO unadu tiruvuLLam eppaDiyO enadu


anupallavi

  endai unadanbar nindai shei ulagil maindar manai enru bandham koLLum enadu


caraNam   vINAip-poruL tEDa vAzh nAL kazhittad vizhaluk-kiraittArpOl AccE
 cANAna kumbikku UNADiyE nALum samayam ellaam pAzhAi-pOccE ponnambala
 vANanE un krpai kANEnE nal vAzhvurum vazhiyum kANEnE
 sthANuvE unnaDit-tAmaraiyil rAmadAsanuk-kOridam vAsattirkillaiyO
